chartbeat.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

content.description: Real-time NCAAM College Basketball scores on ESPN
content.keywords: NCAAM Scores, NCAAM scoreboard, College Basketball Scores, College Basketball scoreboard

headlines.description: Miles Bridges scored 31 points, Jaren Jackson Jr. had 21 points and 11 rebounds and No. 6 Michigan State got a harder-than-expected 87-74 win over Illinois on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bridges, No. 6 Michigan State hold off Illinois 87-74

video.headline: Bridges does it all in one-play

headlines.description: Desmond Bane scored eight of his 15 points in just over a minute early in the second half, and TCU beat No. 7 West Virginia 82-73 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: TCU upsets No. 7 WVU 82-73 after falling out of Top 25

video.headline: TCU takes down No. 7 West Virginia

headlines.description: Justin Robinson scored 19 points and Virginia Tech pulled away in the second half to beat No. 10 North Carolina 80-69 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Robinson's 19 lead Hokies past No. 10 UNC, 80-69

video.headline: Virginia Tech pulls off upset of North Carolina

headlines.description: Keita Bates-Diop scored 14 of his 20 points in the second half and No. 13 Ohio State beat Nebraska 64-59 on Monday night, the fourth victory for the surging Buckeyes in the last eight days.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bates-Diop scores 20 as No. 13 Buckeyes slip past Nebraska

video.headline: Ohio State holds off Nebraska to remain perfect in conference play

headlines.description: Juwan Morgan scored 10 of his 25 points during Indiana's decisive late run Monday night, leading the Hoosiers to a 71-68 victory over Maryland.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hoosiers make late run hold up with 71-68 win over Maryland

headlines.description: Freshman Mo Bamba scored a season-high 24 points and grabbed 12 rebounds to lead Texas over Iowa State 73-57 Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bamba's 24 points lead Texas over Iowa State 73-57

headlines.description: Jehyve Floyd had career highs with 22 points and six blocks and Jacob Grandison hit two free throws with 13.4 seconds left to help Holy Cross beat American 60-57 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Floyd, Grandison's late FTs help Holy Cross beat American

headlines.description: Phillip Carr had 13 points and 12 rebounds, Tiwian Kendley added 13 points and Morgan State beat Delaware State 61-47 on Monday night for the Hornets' 16th straight loss.
headlines.shortLinkText: Morgan State hands Delaware State 16th straight loss 61-47

headlines.description: RJ Cole scored 23 points as Howard held on to beat NC A&T 90-88 in overtime on Monday. Charles Williams added 22 points for the Bison.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cole carries Howard over NC A&T 90-88 in OT

headlines.description: Reggie Gardner Jr. scored 19 points, including four 3-pointers, and Raasean Davis added 16 points on 7-of-10 shooting to help North Carolina Central slip past Maryland-Eastern Shore 63-60 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gardner Jr. hits 4 3s, scores 19; NC Central beat UMES 63-60

headlines.description: Jermaine Marrow tied his career high with 31 points and had nine assists to help Hampton beat South Carolina State 91-84 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hampton holds off South Carolina State 91-84

headlines.description: Dexter McClanahan had a career-high 37 points and Savannah State held off Norfolk State in overtime for a 104-99 win on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: McClanahan, Savannah State beat Norfolk State 104-99 in OT

headlines.description: A.J. Mosby and Maurice Howard combined for 36 points on 14-of-24 shooting to help Alcorn State beat Alabama State 81-64 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mosby, Howard lead Alcorn St. to 81-64 win over Alabama St.

headlines.description: Jordon Varnado had 14 points and 10 rebounds on Monday night and scored the winning basket on a putback with 2.7 seconds left to help Troy beat Appalachian State 81-79.
headlines.shortLinkText: Varnado's putback lifts Troy over App State 81-79

headlines.description: Jared Sam shot 8 of 11 from the field and finished with 19 points, including the winning jumper with four seconds left, and Southern slipped past Alabama A&M 62-61 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sam's late basket lifts Southern over Alabama A&M 62-61

headlines.description: Martaveous McKnight scored five points in the final three seconds to give Arkansas-Pine Bluff a 74-72 win over Texas Southern on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pine Bluff wins in wild finish, 74-72 over Texas Southern

headlines.description: Barry Brown scored 34 points, reigning Big 12 player of the week Dean Wade added 24 and Kansas State beat Baylor 90-83 on Monday night for its third straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brown scores 34, Kansas State tops Baylor 90-83

content.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

nowFeed.headline: USC junior forward Bennie Boatwright will miss the rest of the season after suffering a left patella injury during Thursday's win, per the school. Was averaging 13.6 points and 6.4 rebounds.
nowFeed.story: USC junior forward Bennie Boatwright will miss the rest of the season after suffering a left patella injury during Thursday's win, per the school. Was averaging 13.6 points and 6.4 rebounds.

nowFeed.headline: Back at @KUHoops Brings back a great memory thanks to a great group of players. @LBSUhoops https://t.co/aMhklA2Vbl
nowFeed.story: Back at @KUHoops Brings back a great memory thanks to a great group of players. @LBSUhoops vimeo.com/256137612

nowFeed.headline: Under Sean Miller Deandre Ayton is maximizing his enormous potential. Ayton has always possessed the physical tools and a solid basketball IQ. He has worked hard at Zona along with making the adjustments to college basketball. For a freshman big man it's really hard to dominate right away. Since he arrived in the states he was a top ranked player in his class. Would have been top 5 in last years NBA draft. Now he will be a top 3 pick and will be much more prepared.
nowFeed.story: Under Sean Miller Deandre Ayton is maximizing his enormous potential. Ayton has always possessed the physical tools and a solid basketball IQ. He has worked hard at Zona along with making the adjustments to college basketball. For a freshman big man it's really hard to dominate right away. Since he arrived in the states he was a top ranked player in his class. Would have been top 5 in last years NBA draft. Now he will be a top 3 pick and will be much more prepared.

nowFeed.headline:
The race for the No. 1 seeds is more wide open now after a few recent upsets. Per BPI, here's where we stand:

Virginia 99%
Villanova 98%
Purdue 71%
Michigan State 52%
Xavier 32%
Duke 29%
North Carolina 9%
Tennessee 4%
Auburn 3%
Kansas 2%

nowFeed.headline: Houston coach Kelvin Sampson said "good teams should win at home," including his Cougars, who are 13-0 this season at home, including Thursday's 67-62 upset of No. 5 Cincinnati.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati shot just 6-for-19 (31.6%) in the second half vs. Houston, including a FG drought of nearly 12 minutes down the stretch. The Bearcats got out rebounded 36-27. Both of those bit them tonight.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati shot just 6-for-19 (31.6%) in the second half vs. Houston, including a FG drought of nearly 12 minutes down the stretch. The Bearcats got out rebounded 36-27. Both of those bit them tonight.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati's loss at Houston will likely drop them from the No. 2-seed line in Joe Lunardi's Bracketology, with Texas Tech likely being the beneficiary to move up. The Cougars, who were a 10-seed coming into the night, scored another big resume win after picking one up over Wichita State in January.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati's loss at Houston will likely drop them from the No. 2-seed line in Joe Lunardi's Bracketology, with Texas Tech likely being the beneficiary to move up. The Cougars, who were a 10-seed coming into the night, scored another big resume win after picking one up over Wichita State in January.

nowFeed.headline: Houston upsets No. 5 Cincinnati 67-62, ending the Bearcats nation-leading 16-game winning streak. It's the first time the Cougars have beaten two top-10 opponents in a season since 1984.
nowFeed.story: Houston upsets No. 5 Cincinnati 67-62, ending the Bearcats nation-leading 16-game winning streak. It's the first time the Cougars have beaten two top-10 opponents in a season since 1984.

nowFeed.headline: Ironically, Cincinnati's loss to Houston also finally gives Cincinnati its first win over a likely NCAA Tournament team.
nowFeed.story: Ironically, Cincinnati's loss to Houston also finally gives Cincinnati its first win over a likely NCAA Tournament team.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati getting it done at the foul line tonight, hitting 17-of-21 free throw attempts. The Bearcats are hanging on to a 50-49 lead over Houston with 4:10 left.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati getting it done at the foul line tonight, hitting 17-of-21 free throw attempts. The Bearcats are hanging on to a 50-49 lead over Houston with 4:10 left.
